channel.title: NEWbie question
channel.description:
Heeello I'm new. Can someone tell me how to connect to a server. Me and my friend wants to practice kalphite queen, barrows and stuff.
It says "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "cancel" then "start server" to make your own", on every server

item.title: NEWbie question
item.dc:creator: @peterspliid peterspliid
item.description:
@peterspliid wrote:

[08:59:28] Starting MoparScape 3.2
[08:59:29]
[08:59:29] News: Attention: The integrated server that starts
[08:59:29] News: via the ‘Start Server’ button may not work if
[08:59:29] News: you have not ran it before, sorry for the
[08:59:29] News: inconveniance, it will be fixed shortly.
[08:59:29] News:
[08:59:29] News: Welcome to MoparScape 3.2, the pinnacle of RS2
[08:59:29] News: first generation client editing, with a built
[08:59:29] News: in private server, music player capable of playing
[08:59:29] News: both midis and mp3s, item/object/npc changer/viewer and
[08:59:29] News: much much more. For updates, suggestions, or help
[08:59:29] News: please visit the forums at www.moparisthebest.com/smf
[08:59:29] News: and post in my thread. Y’all have fun.
[08:59:29] News:
[08:59:29] News: For online servers, look at the
[08:59:29] News: server status list at moparisthebest.com
[08:59:29] News:
[08:59:29] News: -moparisthebest
[08:59:29] Server : 127.0.0.1
[09:00:36]
[09:00:36] Logging into (peterspliid, *****)
[09:00:36] Your UID is: 8744556
[09:00:36] An exception occured in getCodeBase(): java.net.MalformedURLException: For input string: “43594:80”

Read full topic

item.title: NEWbie question
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

Go to the server status page, and check out a server of your choice, then put the server ip in and the port.

Read full topic
